item.description:
This event lasts until 9 PM!

"Kristen Haley of BeantownSocial.com has organized this event.BeantownSocial is all about being social in Boston. They host events that bring together people interested in semi-professional and fun networking. You can find them on Meetup, Facebook, A Small World, Twitter, Plancast, Boston.com."

Let's join them for yet another reason to celebrate this Christmas/Hanukkah/ Festivas/Holiday Season with new and old friends and nosh on some complimentary appetizers provided by the amazing Think Tank Bistro in Cambridge. Party with BeantownSocial, The Red Sox Natives, Boston Happy Hour, Social Fun and other groups. The event is on facebook and eventbrite.

"**UPDATE: Please RSVP at EventBrite so Kristen can get a more accurate count. http://beantownsocial.eventbrite.com.**

"We will have a Breakaway at 7:30 PM so we may facilitate a kickass social networking session. There is no cover."

Everyone is responsible for their own drinks. Please maintain your own bar tab or pay as you order and tip your servers. See you at Think Tank Bistro.
item.name: Social Media Holiday Multi-meetup at Think Tank, Cambridge
